original_title: Petit Story 9 小さな幼精4つの物語 久我かのん
overview: Four stories in which the 149 cm infant "Kanon" plays an active role. 1 Take a bath with your favorite father and discuss her breast swelling. 2 Idol egg "Kanon" is brought to a massage shop by her mother, and she is healed from her daily lesson fatigue with an oil massage. 3 "Kanon-chan" wearing a swimsuit gently speaks and blames the uncle. 4 The doctor came to see me because my mother was not working part-time. While examining her throat and measuring her pulse, she was gradually stripped naked and the doctor injected a thick injection into the girl's bud...
title: Petit Story 9 – Four Tales About A Little Nymph Kanon Kuga
